verses.name: Luke 22:29
verses.text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom, as my Father hath appointed unto me;

verses.name: Luke 22:30
verses.text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom, and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel.

verses.name: Luke 22:31
verses.text: And the Lord said, Simon, Simon, behold, Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat:

verses.name: Luke 22:32
verses.text: But I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not: and when thou art converted, strengthen thy brethren.

verses.name: Luke 22:33
verses.text: And he said unto him, Lord, I am ready to go with thee, both into prison, and to death.
